channel.title: Help with objekts!
channel.description:
hey i need some help with objects and some questions i want answer on
1. how to add objekts like fire so ppls don't can go into the road i have closed by objekts?
2. if i have some objekts i didn't put in like bank both's. how can i remove the bank boths?
3. (last one :D) how to get like fire to move?
thx

item.title: Help with objekts!
item.dc:creator: @I_need_a_username I need a username
item.description:
@I_need_a_username wrote:

translation:
hey i need some help with objects, and i have some questions For you to answer

  1. how to add objects, like fire, so players Cannot go into the road i have closed by objects?

  2. if i have some objects i didn’t put in like bank booth’s, how can i remove the bank booths?

  3. (last one ) how to get fire to move?

thx

Whell, To make an object, like sp3ke Said,
Look for “MakeGlobalObject” and add this in:
xpos, ypos, object id, Facing
MakeGlobalObject(2775, 3483, 6951, -1)

To delete an object look for
“deletethatobject” and add
And you should see some simalar coding, Just do what the coding Already does…EG

DeleteThatObject(2775, 3483)

idk bout the Fire, something with graphics… Google it mayby? =P

Read full topic

item.title: Help with objekts!
item.dc:creator: @Sp3ke Sp3ke
item.description:
@Sp3ke wrote:

“Bank boths” LOLOLOLO

Anyway, I don’t have a clue what you’re asking. If you want to use an object to baricade an entrance then just search for “makeglobalobject” in client.java untill you see something like this :

makeGlobalObject(2775, 3483, 6951, -1,

First number X coord, second number Y coord, third number object ID, fourth number rotation

Read full topic
